  "description": "Uncle Stan&#39;s Foods is a small chops company known for it&#39;s unique finger food taste all over Lagos. Our brand makes us unique.

Job Positon: Human Resources Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos, Nigeria

Job Summary


	The Human Resource Executive is responsible for supporting all HR functions, ensuring efficient operations of the HR department, and helping to build a productive, compliant, and positive work environment.
	This role focuses on recruitment, employee relations, performance management, HR administration, and ensuring compliance with company policies and labour laws.


Key Responsibilities
Recruitment &amp; Onboarding:


	Manage the end-to-end recruitment process: job posting, screening, interviewing, and onboarding.
	Maintain an updated database of all staff and job applicants.
	Coordinate staff orientation and ensure new hires are properly integrated into the company culture.


Employee Relations:


	Support employee engagement initiatives to foster motivation and retention.
	Address staff grievances promptly and escalate serious issues where necessary.
	Promote effective communication between management and staff.


Performance Management:


	Assist in implementing performance appraisal systems and tracking KPIs.
	Support managers with performance review processes and documentation.


HR Administration:


	Maintain accurate employee records, including attendance, leave, and payroll documentation.
	Prepare HR reports and ensure all HR files are up-to-date and confidential.
	Ensure compliance with company policies and employment laws.


Training &amp; Development:


	Identify training needs and assist in organizing internal and external training sessions.
	Track employee development and training outcomes.


Compliance &amp; Policy Implementation:


	Enforce HR policies, disciplinary actions, and standard operating procedures.
	Keep up to date with labour law regulations and HR best practices.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
	2 - 4 years of experience in a similar HR role.
	Strong understanding of HR principles, Nigerian labour law, and HRIS systems.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Proficient in MS Office and HR software (e.g., Zoho People, BambooHR, etc.).


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hrunclestansfoods@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
